## Phase 1: Foundation (In Progress)

- [x] **T001** `feat` Fastify API scaffold (port 5013, TypeScript, plugins) — Foundation
- [x] **T002** `feat` Prisma schema: 14 tables (Users, DIDs, Credentials, Issuers, Anchors, etc.) — FR-001
- [x] **T003** `feat` Security: Helmet, CORS, rate limiting (tiered), request IDs — FR-012
- [x] **T004** `feat` Auth plugin: JWT + API key dual auth — FR-001
- [x] **T005** `feat` Redis plugin (cache, sessions, pub/sub) — Foundation
- [x] **T006** `feat` Crypto utilities: Ed25519 key generation, bcrypt hashing — FR-002
- [x] **T007** `feat` Next.js web scaffold with landing page (port 3117) — Foundation
- [ ] **T008** `feat` Auth endpoints: register + login with JWT — FR-001
- [x] **T009** `test` Health check integration test (5 test cases) — Foundation

## Phase 2: Identity Core — DIDs (Planned)

- [ ] **T010** `test` Write DID creation + resolution tests — FR-002, FR-003
- [ ] **T011** `feat` DID Service: create did:humanid with Ed25519 keypair — FR-002
- [ ] **T012** `feat` DID Document generation (W3C DID Core spec) — FR-002
- [ ] **T013** `feat` DID resolution endpoint (GET /api/v1/dids/:did) — FR-003
- [ ] **T014** `feat` DID update + deactivation — FR-003
- [ ] **T015** `feat` Biometric binding (FIDO2/WebAuthn enrollment) — FR-004
- [ ] **T016** `feat` Recovery configuration (phrase, social, cloud options) — FR-005
- [ ] **T017** `test` Verify DID tests pass — FR-002, FR-003

## Phase 3: Credentials & Verification (Planned)

- [ ] **T020** `test` Write credential issuance + verification tests — FR-006, FR-007
- [ ] **T021** `feat` Credential issuance: W3C VC with Ed25519 signing — FR-006
- [ ] **T022** `feat` Credential templates: define and manage claim schemas — FR-006
- [ ] **T023** `feat` Selective disclosure with ZKP (Groth16 via snarkjs) — FR-007
- [ ] **T024** `feat` Verification service: 4-check (signature, trust, revocation, expiry) — FR-007
- [ ] **T025** `feat` Credential presentation (Verifiable Presentation creation) — FR-007
- [ ] **T026** `feat` Credential revocation (on-chain status registry) — FR-008
- [ ] **T027** `feat` Batch credential issuance (500 creds/60s) — FR-006
- [ ] **T028** `test` Verify credential + verification tests pass — FR-006, FR-007

## Phase 5: Blockchain & Production (Planned)
